text: Billy Stedman (born 3 November 1999) is an English professional footballer who most recently played as a forward for League One club Coventry City. ==Career== Stedman started his career in the youth system at Coventry City before making his debut in an EFL Trophy 3–0 defeat against Arsenal U21 coming on in the 87th minute for Reise Allassani. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="3" |League ! colspan="2" |FA Cup ! colspan="2" |League Cup ! colspan="2" |Other ! colspan="2" |Total |- !|Division!!Apps!!Goals !Apps!!Goals !Apps!!Goals !Apps!!Goals !Apps!!Goals |- |Coventry City |2018–19 |League One |0||0||0||0||0||0||1Appearances in EFL Trophy||0||1||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!1!!0 |} ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Coventry City F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: Billy Stedman
